name: Oop
body: ### Object Oriented Programming with Javascript. On my github repository, i have taken out time to explain deeply the concepts of OOP. In Javascript, almost everything is an object which is why it is essential for you to understand Object Oriented Programming. OOP is very important today because almost every language is object-oriented such as Python , Java, C/C++ and even Dart. ### Author This article was written by webgurumedia on July 19, 2020. You can follow webgurumedia on twitter MediaWebguru. ### Support or Contact Having trouble with access to the repository? DM me on twitter MediaWebguru.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
